divs: Sighting DetailsWe were in my backyard. Blinking light. Aircraft. Slight fear then calmness. Itwas a round object that was blinking red, green, blue, and white. It looked likea star are first then it started blinking. There was only one but then we say 3more appeared.It was hovering staying in the same spot from 1:50 to about3:00a.m. It faded out.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lake Dallas
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Lights hovering for about an hour.
